mapper.select: SELECT od.order_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_category, mp.size, mp.menu_price, CASE WHEN od.is_set = 1 THEN mp.discount_price ELSE mp.menu_price END AS price, od.menu_count, o.total_price, o.order_time FROM order_detail_tb od LEFT OUTER JOIN menu_price_tb mp ON od.menu_price_id = mp.menu_price_id LEFT OUTER JOIN menu_tb m ON mp.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT OUTER JOIN order_tb o ON od.order_id = o.order_id; WHERE o.order_time LIKE CONCAT(#{time}, '%');
